Question: Dynamic _______ inserts a routine into memory only when the routine is called by a program.
Explanation: Memory can potentially be conserved by loading routines in memory only when a program calls the routine. The routine may be linked either statically during load time or dynamically during program execution.

Question: _____ occurs when a process spends more time paging than executing.
Explanation: If a process has a sustained high page fault rate it is spending more time paging - resolving page faults - than executing.

Question: ________ is the time required for the disk arm to move to the desired cylinder on an HDD device.
Explanation: Seek time is the required time for the disk arm to move to the appropriate cylinder - the track at a given arm position of the HDD.
